jd: From: Shivendra, Synkriom shivendra.singh@synkriom.com Reply to: shivendra.singh@synkriom.com Job Title: Oracle PL/SQL DeveloperLocation: Bloomfield CT Employment Type: CTH Passport is mandatory Required Skills:Proven experience working with large data volumes and creating complex SQL queries.Strong knowledge of query tuning and performance optimization.Hands-on experience with materialized views and data refresh mechanisms.Expertise in designing data models, especially for scenarios involving online exams with normalization.Ability to create and manage Oracle Scheduler Jobs for running PL/SQL blocks at specified intervals.Proficiency in identifying table size and storage locations for given datasets.Experience handling Oracle XML, JSON, and CLOB data.Nice to Have:Experience with Python for database-related scripting and automation.Competencies:Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Ability to work with large, complex databases and tune performance.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
